reviewText: i've been looking for this at Comic conventions for years. finally purchased it. very good story (at some times confusing), but it all comes together beautifully at the end
I originally bought this series for my Husband, but it turns out that I love this too! Not recommended for kids, but great for adults!

I remember seeing this years ago on VHS and loved the story. So I was very happy to get it on DVD.
If you like a good story and you are into Japanese Animation this is a very nice DVD.
Crying Freeman is one of the best animes ever made! A MUST for any anime lover!
